Headline: No trains between Polk and the Loop
ShortDescription: Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Polk and the Loop due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line service has been temporarily suspended between Polk and the Loop due to track conditions.
As a result, trains are operating between 54th/Cermak and Polk only. 
Passengers may use #20 Madison buses as an alternative to Pink Line service.
Shuttle buses will be available to provide connecting service through the affected area.
See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.
We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Green Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Green Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area, between Harlem and Clark/Lake.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: #63 63rd buses, Red Line

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Normal
ShortDescription: Eastbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Normal.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Purple Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Normal Purple Line service is operating with residual delays following an earlier track condition. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Normal Purple Line service is operating with residual delays following an earlier track condition. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to track conditions. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
